actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 94-1253.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 14234.  A bill making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1977.

summary.text: Provides that during the consideration of the bill (H.R. 14234) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1977, specified provisions of the House rules restricting the consideration of appropriations shall be waived.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 14234.  A bill making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1977.
